TopicTitle: No helmets in IVA view since 1.4

Articles.Content: Since version 1.4 Kerbals in IVA seams to wear no helmets anymore. Is there an option to let them put their helmets on as before?
Depends on the pod.  I'm in 1.3.1 right now.  I threw Jeb in an Mk1 command pod, and he's not wearing a helmet.
Possibly you can change an entry in a configuration file so that they have her helmets on? Like here:
You know, I didn't even think of it, but I have TRR.  Lemme try stock...
I believe there was a setting for this, at least in 1.3/1.3.1.

Ok, it was TRR.  Helmet is present in stock 1.3.1, and gone in stock 1.4.1

I don't see an option for it in either version.
Jeb sure gets his helmet on in a hurry when I push the EVA button...

3 hours ago, KnutG said:

Since version 1.4 Kerbals in IVA seams to wear no helmets anymore. Is there an option to let them put their helmets on as before?

Quote

A simple ModuleManager patch to restore helmets

It works! With a little modification the mk1 pod is with helmet inside:

  

@INTERNAL[KV?_IVA|MK2POD_IVA|MEM_IVA|mk1PodCockpit]
{
    @MODULE[InternalSeat],*
    {
        @allowCrewHelmet = true
    }
}

(make a *.cfg file with the code in it and put this in GAMEDATA folder with ModuleManager)

In the MEM, the standart helmets seems to be a little bit too big...
